TopicTitle: Images of spaceships that may never be built

Articles.Content:
Space.com gallery of future starships

I know that this particular page is well over a year old but I'll use it as an excuse to thank the devs for creating a game that allows us to tinker with ships that look almost exactly like the ones pictured in that gallery.

I'm still hoping that SKYLON will ever see the light of day; reading a book about the HOTOL project when I was a kid was part of the reasons I got interested in space.
Hm, thats a cool gallery. I did see plans for the daedalus ship before, but I never realizen how enormous this thing is...
Some photos inspired me to do some things that I wanted to do before...AND IT'S 3th WEEKEND THIS MONTH! MY TIME FOR NEW PROTOTYPES!

Adrian Mann does good work. His main gallery is here

http://www.bisbos.com/spacecraft.html

I have collected a few realistic designs here

http://www.projectrho.com/public_html/rocket/realdesigns.php

With the Skylon project, I know the prevailing opinion is that the project will be scrapped before the craft is completed, but what about the engines? Do you think it's likely these will be successfully completed? It's the most important part and if that is completed they could be used in future spaceplane projects.
